scripts.setup: git submodule update --init --recursive --remote && cd strudel && git checkout main && git stash && git pull && cd .. && pnpm install -r && pnpm update && git commit -a -m 'Updated Strudel from origin.'
scripts.build-strudel: python3 patch-strudel.py && cd strudel && pnpm run setup && pnpm run build
scripts.build: pnpm run build-strudel && vite build && cp -rf strudel/website/dist/* dist/ && rm dist/index.html && rm dist/CNAME && python3 patch-dist.py && ls -ll dist
